divs: Sighting Details Living in West Baden Indiana never seen so meany UFOs in my life this is a every night thing don't think I'm crazy but I think they have a Base here you have to see it for yourself to know Ships come from the North and and the south running low to the tree tops one night on JANUARY 27 2013 I counted 36 of them 16 went underground the rest landed out into the woods they come around 12:00am to 3:00am
trends: There have been no other sightings in West Baden Springs
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Every night landing in west baden indiana behind Mt.Arie using valley to go to Base underground.
